# coding: utf-8

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

a_sum = 0
for i in range(n):
    a_sum += 1/a[i]

print(1/a_sum)

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())
numbers = [int(x) for x in sys.stdin.readline().split()]
sum_of_inverses = 0
for number in numbers:
    sum_of_inverses += 1/number
print(1/sum_of_inverses)
